abstract.text: This struct represents a software license and also works
as a namespace for license-related types.

inlineContent.text: A license can specify various information and conditions,
such as customer, expiration date, tier, the bundles and
platforms it can be used with, which features it unlocks,
etc. You can also define additional info.
The various dates let you tailor your license conditions.

This type has many validation functions that can be used
to validate if it is valid, if it is valid for a certain
bundle, environment, platform, date, etc.

abstract.text: This enum defines various license service types that can
be used to validate license keys and resolve licenses.

LicenseKit helps you protect your Swift-based software with commercial licenses.
This class is the most central type in LicenseKit and is
used to fetch licenses using an injected license service.
